barista_admin_record.MSG_TEXT: This installation of AddonSoftware should only be used for demonstrations. It is[$0a$]running in the current download area for BASIS products, and should not be used[$0a$]for a production system. Data and programs in this location can be overwritten by[$0a$]future BASIS downloads. For production systems, use Addon's Install/Upgrade[$0a$]Utilities to create installations outside the BASIS download area.[$0a$]
